de.systemagmbh.interfaces.bus
Interface ISysSubject

All Known Implementing Classes:
DummyISysSubject
public interface ISysSubject

A ISysSubject is an Object that handles and defines the Subjectadress of a message.

Version:
$Revision: 1.6 $
Author:
Herbert Helmstreit
